name: The Whitetail Incident
storyline: After receiving a call from his friend Johnathan. The player begins to go to the campsite that his friend stayed at. Upon discovering a dead camper and Johnathan's shotgun the player begins to wander around the forest until he discovers a cult doing a ritual with 3 stakes, two of them had dead campers tied to them while in the middle was Johnathan moving around like he was possessed. after killing the cult Johnathan turns into a whitetail and runs off. After fighting swarms of cultists, he finds now whitetail Johnathan trying to kill him. After succeeding in killing the whitetail the game ends
summary: A short horror game where you have to survive cultist, with a shotgun in hand can you make it to the end?
